translation.en: ♪ Countdown till we blast open the top ♪
translation.zh: 倒计时 香槟开瓶欢迎品尝
因为这是我们唯一的坚强

translation.en: ♪ When all the days felt black and white ♪
♪ Those were the best shades of my life ♪
♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
translation.zh: 即使我们 跌入谷底

translation.en: ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.zh: 如若永生 继续梦想

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.zh: 活在当下 不负此行

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we got all we need today ♪
♪ That's been running through our veins ♪
♪ That's been singing in the rain ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising up right now ♪
translation.zh: 我们仍在冉冉升起 就是此刻

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
translation.zh: 即使我们 跌入谷底

translation.en: ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.zh: 如若永生 继续梦想

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.zh: 活在当下 不负此行
-太棒了！-听起来棒极了 各位！
谢谢 我们是落日曲线 ！

translation.en: Too bad we wasted the tightest we've played on sound check!
translation.zh: 真可惜这次表演浪费在试音上这是我们最棒的一次

translation.en: Wait until tonight, man, when this place gets packed with record execs.
translation.zh: 等着看今晚的表演吧 这里会挤满了唱片制作人
亚历克斯 你演奏得太棒了

translation.en: Oh no. I was just warming up. You guys were the ones on fire.
translation.zh: 没有啦 我只是在热身你们才是最热火朝天的

translation.en: Could you just own your awesomeness for once?
translation.zh: 你就不能接受一次夸奖吗？
好吧 我确实演奏得很棒

translation.en: OK, well, I'm thinking we fuel up before the show. I'm thinking street dogs.
translation.zh: 好了我想我们应该在演出之前填饱肚子 我觉得街头热狗不错

translation.en: Vegetarian. I could never hurt an animal.
translation.zh: 我是素食者 绝不会伤害任何动物

translation.en: I see a lot of bands.
Been in a couple myself. I was really feeling it.
translation.zh: 我自己也组过两支乐队我真的能感受到你们的音乐

translation.en: That's what we do this for. I'm Luke, by the way.
translation.zh: 这正是我们的目标顺便说一下 我是卢克
还有乐队T恤 是美人号的

translation.en: I'll make sure not to wipe the tables down with this one.
translation.zh: 我一定不会用这个擦桌子的

translation.en: Oh, good call. Whenever they get wet, they just kinda fall apart in your hands.
translation.zh: 好主意 这些T恤弄湿了的话就会变得七零八碎

translation.en: Don't you guys have to go get hot dogs?
translation.zh: 你们不是要去吃热狗吗？

translation.en: Yeah, he had a hamburger for lunch.
translation.zh: 是啊 他午饭吃的汉堡
你是说落日大道闻起来的味道？

translation.en: It's what that girl said in there tonight.
translation.zh: 我是说那个女孩儿刚刚说的话

translation.en: About our music, all right? It's like an energy.
translation.zh: 关于我们的音乐 它有一种活力
能够把我们和别人联系起来

translation.en: They can feel us when we play.
translation.zh: 人们能够感受到我们的演奏

translation.en: I want that connection with everybody.
translation.zh: 我希望能和所有人建立这样的联系

translation.en: Then we're gonna need more T-shirts.
translation.zh: 那我们还得再做一些T恤

translation.en: -[girl 2] Oh my God. Reggie! -[girl 1] Oh my God! Hi, it's me!
translation.zh: -天呐 是雷吉！-雷吉 我的天 嗨 是我！

translation.en: Man... I can't wait until we eat someplace
translation.zh: 哎 我真是等不及去别的地方吃饭

translation.en: where the condiments aren't served out of the back of an Oldsmobile.
translation.zh: 而不用再从奥兹摩比的后备箱里取调料

translation.en: Hey... Sorry, I got some pickle juice on your battery cables.
translation.zh: 抱歉我把一些腌菜汁洒在你的电瓶线上了

translation.en: No problem. It'll help with the rust.
translation.zh: 没事 那还能去去铁锈呢
这感觉真是棒极了 两位
我们要在奥芬剧院演出了！

translation.en: I can't even count how many bands have played here
translation.zh: 在那里演出的乐队简直数不胜数

translation.en: and then ended up being huge.
translation.zh: 而且最后都成了大牌乐队
我们会成为传奇人物的！

translation.en: Chill, man. Street dogs haven't killed us yet.
translation.zh: 放松点 老兄街头热狗还没毒死我们呢
嗨 差强人意的家伙

translation.en: OK, I know you don't want me to ask, but have you figured out
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道你不想听我问这个问题 可你想好今天怎么做了吗？

translation.en: -what you're gonna do today? -I'll know in the moment.
translation.zh: 可你想好今天怎么做了吗？ 到时候我自然会知道

translation.en: Mrs. Harrison said this is your last chance.
translation.zh: 哈瑞森老师说这可是你最后一次机会

translation.en: Ugh! What is she handing out?
Here you go. My group's performing at the spirit rally tomorrow.
translation.zh: 给你我的女团会在明天的动员大会上表演

translation.en: I'm sure you guys have nothing better to do.
translation.zh: 你们肯定也没别的事可干吧
我的天呢 凯莉 谢谢你咯！

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Flynn. Don't bother coming!
translation.zh: 我的天呢 弗林 你不用来了！
明天来看脏脏糖果的表演

translation.en: You know they're gonna get married and have a bunch of unholy babies.
translation.zh: 你明知道他们会结婚然后会生下一群可怕的小孩儿

translation.en: You'd actually have to talk to him to know that.
translation.zh: 你得真的和他说过话才会知道

translation.en: And only one of them has to be a demon to make a demon baby.
translation.zh: 他们两个人里 只要有一个是恶魔生下的小孩儿就是恶魔

translation.en: There's that smile. Now, let's go prove everybody wrong.
translation.zh: 终于笑了我们让所有人瞧瞧你的真本事吧

translation.en: Almost as impressive as your game against Glendale.
translation.zh: 几乎和你对战格兰德的比赛一样精彩

translation.en: OK, we have one last performance.
translation.zh: 好了 还剩下最后一个表演
给我小心点儿 凯莉

translation.en: I was about to go watch your brother's game.
translation.zh: 我正要去看你弟弟的比赛呢

translation.en: I've had photo shoots all day. Didn't even get a chance to eat.
translation.zh: 我一整天都在拍照 都没时间吃东西

translation.en: I got a phone call today.

translation.zh: 是啊 我也猜到会是这样

translation.en: -Well, it was my Realtor friend. -Oh, that.
translation.zh: -是我的房地产中介朋友-噢 这样啊

translation.en: Yeah, and she says if we are serious about selling the house,
translation.zh: 嗯 她说如果我们真的想卖掉房子

translation.en: then she wants me to take some pictures for the website.
translation.zh: 那么她想让我们拍些照片放在网站上

translation.en: Which means we have to do a lot of cleaning
translation.zh: 也就是说 我们得好好打扫一番

translation.en: and get rid of some stuff.
And maybe you can... tackle Mom's studio?
translation.zh: 也许你能去清理一下妈妈的录音室？

translation.en: You know, your brother and I wouldn't even know where to begin.
translation.zh: 我和你弟弟都不知道该从哪里下手

translation.en: It's OK, honey. If you're not ready, I--
translation.zh: 没关系 如果你还没准备好 我…
太好了 乖女儿 谢谢你

translation.en: Oh, and don't forget the loft.
You know, those old instruments that were there when we moved in?
translation.zh: 还记得我们搬进来时阁楼里的那些旧乐器吗？

translation.en: Oh God. I'm gonna be late.
How did we get back here?
Whoa! Slow down. You look like you've seen a ghost.
translation.zh: 慢点 你看起来像是见了鬼
拜托 弗林 我可是在紧急呼救啊！

translation.en: Why aren't you answering me? [exhales sharply]
Just wanted to make sure you were OK.
translation.zh: 我只是来看看你是否没事

translation.en: You don't believe me, do you?
Honey, of course I do. Mija, I see your mom all the time.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我当然信你 乖女儿 我总是会看见你妈妈

translation.en: I know. It's different for all of us.
translation.zh: 我知道 每个人的经历都是不同的

translation.en: Dad, you're not listening to me.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你没仔细听我说
我刚才在那里真的看到了一些东西

translation.en: Tell me what you saw. It's just you and me here.
translation.zh: 现在只有你和我两个人你说说你看到什么了

translation.en: [sighs] You sound just like Dr. Turner.
translation.zh: 你的语气和特纳医生一样

translation.en: Well, maybe seeing Dr. Turner again isn't such a bad idea.
translation.zh: 也许重新去见特纳医生也不是太糟的主意

translation.en: I know I saw something. I'm not crazy.
translation.zh: 我知道我看到了一些东西我可没疯

translation.en: Well, we're all a little crazy.
Oh my God! Please stop screaming!
Who are you, and what are you doing in my mom's studio?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？在我妈妈的录音室里做什么？

translation.en: Your mom's studio? This is our studio. Trust me, my...
translation.zh: 你妈妈的录音室？这可是我们的录音室 相信我 我的…

translation.en: The grand piano is new, and... and... and ...
translation.zh: 这架三角钢琴是新的 而且…

translation.en: That is definitely not my six-string.
translation.zh: 这个绝对不是我的吉他

translation.en: Can you give me just one second?
Just... give me a second. Thank you.
translation.zh: 就…稍稍等一下 谢谢你

translation.en: Guys, what is going on? How did she get her stuff in here so fast?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？她怎么能这么快就把她的东西搬来？

translation.en: Maybe... maybe she's a witch. There's chairs floating on the ceiling.
translation.zh: 也许她是个女巫毕竟天花板上飘着椅子

translation.en: OK, there is no such thing as witches.
translation.zh: 好了 没有女巫这种东西

translation.en: You sure? I used to think there was no such thing as ghosts.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？我以前还认为没有鬼呢

translation.en: OK, so we're going with witch?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们就认定她是女巫？

translation.en: No! We are not going with witch.
translation.zh: 不行 不能认定她是女巫

translation.en: She's not a witch. OK, look. She's just scared.
translation.zh: 她不是女巫 你看 她只是很害怕而已

translation.en: OK? Let someone with a softer touch handle this.
translation.zh: 好吗？不如让我这个温柔一点的人来处理

translation.en: Why are you in our studio?
translation.zh: 你为什么在我们的录音室里？

translation.en: Oh my gosh! How did you do that?
translation.zh: 我的天！你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Clearly, you're not understanding... She doesn't get it.
translation.zh: 你显然还是没理解…她还是不明白

translation.en: OK, look. We're ghosts, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 我们是鬼魂 好吗？

translation.en: We're just three ghosts, and we're really happy to be home.
translation.zh: 我们只是三个鬼魂现在回家了 所以很开心

translation.en: So, thank you for the flowers. They really brighten up the room.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的花 让整个房间都靓丽起来

translation.en: -We're in a band called Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.zh: -我们是一支乐队 叫“落日曲线”-跟你的朋友们宣传下

translation.en: Last night was supposed to be a really big night for us.
translation.zh: 昨晚本来是我们很重要的一晚

translation.en: It was gonna change our lives.
I'm, uh... I'm pretty sure it did.
This is freaking me out. [breathes sharply, grunts]
-What is that? What are you doing? -It's my phone.
translation.zh: -那是什么？你在干嘛？-是我的手机

translation.en: No! Stop talking to them. They aren't real.
translation.zh: 不 别再和他们说话了 他们不是真的这世上没有帅哥鬼魂这种东西

translation.en: -There's no such thing as cute ghosts. -Oh, think we're cute?
translation.zh: 他们不是真的这世上没有帅哥鬼魂这种东西 你觉得我们帅吗？

translation.en: -[Julie taps keys] -Who you calling? I'm Googling Sunset Swerve.
translation.zh: -你在打给谁？-我在搜索“落日虚线”
确实有落日曲线这个乐队

translation.en: What? No. No, no, no. Th-Th-That's impossible.
translation.zh: 什么？不会 不可能的

translation.en: After we floated out of the ambulance,
translation.zh: 我们从救护车里飘走后

translation.en: all we did was go to that weird, dark room where Alex cried.
translation.zh: 就飘到一个奇怪的黑暗小屋里亚历克斯在那哭了

translation.en: I think we were all pretty upset. OK.
translation.zh: 我们都很伤心的 好吧

translation.en: But that was just for like an hour.
translation.zh: 但我们好像只在那里呆了一小时

translation.en: Look. I'm just telling you what my phone says.
translation.zh: 听着 我只是告诉你们我查到的信息

translation.en: Wait. So... So, it has been 25 years.
translation.zh: 等一下 所以已经过了25年

translation.en: I have been crying for 25 years? How is that possible?
translation.zh: 也就是说 我哭了整整25年？ -那怎么可能？-你确实是个多愁伤感的人

translation.en: -Well, you're a very emotional person. -I am not!
translation.zh: -那怎么可能？-你确实是个多愁伤感的人 我才不是！

translation.en: [boy] Thought you were afraid to come out here.
translation.zh: 我以为你害怕来这里呢

translation.en: You talking to your ghost friend? How does he look? Is he hideous?
translation.zh: 你还在和你的鬼魂朋友聊天吗？他什么样子？很丑吗？
-他能看到你-不 他看不到
首先 我想要个正常的姐姐

translation.en: Stop being weird and come eat.
translation.zh: 不要再搞什么古怪了 来吃饭

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, that's... -usually how ghosts work. -[Reggie] Hmm.
translation.zh: 是啊 通常来讲人们是看不到鬼的

translation.en: Look, I'm very sorry for what happened to you guys,
translation.zh: 对于发生在你们身上的事我很惋惜

translation.en: but this isn't your studio anymore.
translation.zh: 但这里不再是你们的录音室了
-我们还不知道你的名字-我叫茱莉
我是亚历克斯 你好吗？

translation.en: Did you miss the part where she kicked us out, or...
translation.zh: 你是没听到她要赶我们出去 还是…

translation.en: Thank you for our leftovers and the power of the mighty microwave.
translation.zh: 感恩我们的剩饭以及强大微波炉的力量

translation.en: Carlos tells me he found you in the studio.
translation.zh: 卡洛斯说他在录音室找到了你

translation.en: She was out there talking to herself.
I was rehearsing for a play.
I brought you my pasteles and arroz con pollo.
translation.zh: 我给你们带了鸡肉饭和糕点
谢谢 姨妈 闻起来很香呢

translation.en: I can't let you have leftovers every night.
translation.zh: 我可不能让你们每晚都吃剩饭

translation.en: My sister would kill me, may she rest in peace.
translation.zh: 我妹妹会杀了我的 愿她安息

translation.en: Oh... I see things here are going better?
translation.zh: 看样子你们现在还挺不错的？

translation.en: ...Julie has been cleaning out mom's studio.
translation.zh: 茱莉在清理她妈妈的录音室

translation.en: Hopefully, we can get the house on the market and some offers soon.
translation.zh: 但愿我们能把房子挂出去然后很快有买家会出价

translation.en: Well, I like the sound of that.
Moving from here is only gonna help you move on.
translation.zh: 从这里搬出去能帮助你们忘掉过去

translation.en: You've got to rip that Band-Aid off and get the pain over with.
translation.zh: 你们必须撕下创可贴熬过痛苦的时刻

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] That's me. Ripping off the Band-Aid.
translation.zh: 是我撕下创可贴时要说的

translation.en: Hey, Julie, I really like what you guys did with the place.
translation.zh: 茱莉 我很喜欢你们给这里做的装饰

translation.en: Oh, I'm just here to help, mija.
translation.zh: 我只是来帮忙而已 宝贝

translation.en: Oh... I think that's our cue to leave.
I mean, you should be at Pilates.
translation.zh: 我是说 你应该去上普拉提课了
谢谢你给我们带食物来
-我们应该先打个招呼的-没什么

translation.en: And now that you're no longer in the music program,
translation.zh: 现在你不用再参加那个音乐课程了

translation.en: you can concentrate on classes that matter.
translation.zh: 你就可以专心好好上课了

translation.en: You got the e-mail from the school, right?
translation.zh: 你收到学校的邮件了吧？
好的 那我去上普拉提了

translation.en: wanna hear how I slid into home and was almost safe?
translation.zh: 你想不想听听我是怎么滑进本垒而且几乎安全上垒的？

translation.en: You're a good brother. That's not gonna work.
translation.zh: 你是个好弟弟 但是别想转移话题

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me? You made me lie to your aunt.
translation.zh: 你怎么没有告诉我？我还要为你和你姨妈说谎

translation.en: Sorry. I was gonna tell you after dinner.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我本来准备在晚饭后告诉你的

translation.en: Honey, I know those classes can be difficult,
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我知道这些课程会有些难

translation.en: but you still like music, don't you?
translation.zh: 但你还喜欢音乐 不是吗？
我也说不好 也许吧

translation.en: Look, we talked about this, you know? And how painful memories can be, but...
translation.zh: 我们已经聊过了 对吗？回忆会让人感到痛苦 但是…

translation.en: You know, every time I see you and Carlos, I see Mom.
translation.zh: 每次我看到你和卡洛斯的时候我都能看到妈妈

translation.en: It's like she's right here with us.
translation.zh: 就好像她就在这里 和我们一起

translation.en: But you know what? I love that. I do.
translation.zh: 可你知道吗？我喜欢这种感觉 真的

translation.en: And maybe if you'd give yourself a chance,
translation.zh: 也许你给自己一个机会

translation.en: I must have left the stereo on in the garage.
translation.zh: 我肯定是忘了关车库里的音响了

translation.en: The whole neighborhood could hear you. I thought I told you to leave.
translation.zh: 整个街区都能听见你们的声音我已经叫你们离开了

translation.en: Wait. People can hear us play?
translation.zh: 等一下 你们能听见我们的音乐？

translation.en: Yes! And so did my dad and my brother!
translation.zh: 是啊 我爸爸和我弟弟也能听见

translation.en: W-W-Wait. Wait. So, only you can see us,
translation.zh: 等下 所以只有你能看到我们？
但是所有人都能听见我们的音乐？

translation.en: -I mean, what kind of ghosts are we? -Who cares, man? People can hear us play!
translation.zh: -这算哪门子的鬼魂？-谁在乎呢 人们能听见我们演奏啊！

translation.en: We might be dead, but our music isn't.
translation.zh: 虽然我们死了 但我们的音乐还活着
我只是来看看你有没有事

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I just had to turn off the CD player.
translation.zh: 我没事的 我只是关掉了播放机而已

translation.en: Wait. Is this the junk that was in the loft?
translation.zh: 等下 这些是阁楼里的垃圾吗？

translation.en: Some of this stuff's in pretty good shape.
translation.zh: 这些东西有的还很新呢

translation.en: Hey, maybe we can make a couple bucks.
What? Yo, stop touching my drums. Tell him to stop touching my drums.
translation.zh: 什么？喂 别碰我的鼓快让他别碰我的鼓

translation.en: I liked that song you had on.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你刚刚放的那首歌
-很好 我们是落日曲线-和你的朋友们宣传一下

translation.en: It's just an old CD I found.
Well, still, it's nice that you're listening to music again.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 你又开始听音乐了这样很好

translation.en: Out here you can play whatever you want, whenever you want.
translation.zh: 在这里 你想演奏什么都行 无论何时
抱歉 亲爱的 我没…

translation.en: Oh no, no, no, no. Not you. I mean... Uh... Er...
translation.zh: 不 不是说你 我是说…

translation.en: You know, give me a minute.
translation.zh: 你懂的 让我单独呆一会儿

translation.en: We'll figure out this music program thing.
translation.zh: 我们会解决音乐课程这件事的

translation.en: -He likes our song. -Oh yeah. He doesn't count.
translation.zh: -他喜欢我们的歌-是啊 可他不算数

translation.en: Why can't you guys just be normal ghosts?
translation.zh: 你们为什么不能做普通的鬼呢？

translation.en: Hang out at an old mansion. I hear Pasadena's nice.
translation.zh: 去找个老旧的大宅子呆着我听说帕萨迪纳市还不错

translation.en: I think she's warming up to us.
translation.zh: 我觉得她开始对我们有好感了

translation.en: Yeah, I've always wanted to go to Pasadena.
translation.zh: 是啊 我一直想去帕萨迪纳看看
别再这样了 我认真的

translation.en: I know this is all completely insane, but you do know how rad this is?
translation.zh: 我知道这件事很疯狂但你也了解 这简直酷毙了

translation.en: People... Actual people can hear us play.
translation.zh: 人们…活生生的人们能听到我们的音乐

translation.en: Yeah, it's just I've just had a really, really awful day.
translation.zh: 是啊 只不过我今天过得很不顺

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Well, I'm sorry you had a bad day,
translation.zh: -我得走了-你今天过得不好 我很抱歉

translation.en: but three guys just found out that they had a bad 25 years,
translation.zh: 但有三个家伙刚刚发现他们过了很不顺的25年

translation.en: and then they found out that the one thing they lived for
translation.zh: 然后又发现他们活着的时候最热衷的事情

translation.en: in the first place they can still do.
Look, I'm sorry we came into your life,
translation.zh: 听着 很抱歉我们这样闯入你的生活

translation.en: what I just felt in there actually made me feel alive again.
translation.zh: 我刚刚演奏时 感觉自己又活了过来

translation.en: So, you can kick us out if you want, but we're not giving up music.
translation.zh: 所以如果你想的话 你可以赶走我们但我们不会放弃音乐

translation.en: That's a gift no musician would ever turn down.
translation.zh: 这可是任何音乐家都不会拒绝的机会

translation.en: Clearly, your mom is into music.
translation.zh: 你妈妈显然很喜欢音乐

translation.en: You guys haven't seen her anywhere, have you?
No. No, I mean, you're kind of the first person we've seen.
translation.zh: 没有 我是说你算是我们见到的第一个人了

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not dead, so it doesn't answer her question.
translation.zh: 没错 但她并没死所以你没有回答她的问题

translation.en: Yeah. I think she knows what we mean.
translation.zh: 是啊 她应该明白我们的意思
关于你妈妈的事 我们很遗憾

translation.en: Y-Y-You know that's like 25 years of rust just getting dusted off.
translation.zh: 你知道我们刚刚拂去了积攒了25年的陈灰吧

translation.en: -Yeah. Do you play the piano too? -[Julie] No.
No, I don't play. That was my mom's stuff in there.
translation.zh: 不 我不弹 那些都是我妈妈的乐器

translation.en: No way. She's an amazing songwriter.
translation.zh: 不会吧 她写的歌很棒
等下 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: There's a song on the piano. If it's hers...
translation.zh: 钢琴上有一首歌 如果是她写的…

translation.en: I guess...  if you need a place to stay,
translation.zh: 如果你们需要找个地方呆着的话

translation.en: There's a bathroom in the back
and a couch that turns into a bed if you still use any of that stuff.
translation.zh: 还有一个沙发床如果你们还需要这些东西的话

translation.en: I just really like showers and sometimes the occasional bath.
translation.zh: 我只是很喜欢淋浴偶尔也喜欢泡个澡

translation.en: [Julie] "What would you say if I told you
translation.zh: “如果我告诉你我妈妈的录音室里

translation.en: there are three ghosts living in my mom's studio?"
translation.zh: 住着三个鬼魂 你会说什么？”

translation.en: Hey, I know being dead isn't our first choice,
translation.zh: 我知道我们并不想变成鬼魂

translation.en: but, I mean, it sure is easy getting around.
translation.zh: 但飘来飘去还挺方便的

translation.en: I lost my shirt on that one.
Ooh, never mind! There it is.

translation.zh: 你带我们来这里干什么？

translation.en: Just another painful reminder of where we never got to play.
translation.zh: 看看这个我们不能演出的地方又一次引起我们的痛苦回忆

translation.en: -Thanks, Luke. -I mean, boys, the game isn't over yet.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 卢克-小伙子们 事情还没结束呢

translation.en: I'm telling you, we've been given a second chance.
translation.zh: 告诉你们 我们现在有了第二次机会

translation.en: Let's see how many clubs we can hit before sunrise.
translation.zh: 看看日出之前我们能去多少家夜店
亚历克斯 你来不来？
有个地方 你应前往

translation.en: ♪ Life's a test, yes But you go toe-to-toe ♪
translation.zh: 人生如一场考验 没错但你可以旗鼓相当

translation.en: ♪ You don't give up, no You grow ♪
translation.zh: 你不会放弃 不 你会成长
只有这样才会让你出众

translation.en: ♪ Though I wish I could hold you through it ♪
♪ I know it's not the same ♪
♪ And I just want you to do it ♪
♪ So get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.zh: 所以站起身 走出门 重新燃起热情

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.zh: 醒来吧 你只需睁开双眼

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.zh: 看到自己所得 在雨中嘹亮高歌

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.zh: 唤醒你的梦想 让它照进现实

translation.en: [Julie continues singing] ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.en: ♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.zh: 重新燃起热情 走出黑暗迎接光明

translation.en: ♪ Just look them in the eye ♪
♪ I won't let it cloud my mind ♪
♪ And I'm ready to power through it ♪
translation.zh: 我已准备好冲破障碍重重

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause you showed me how to do it ♪
translation.zh: 因为你已向我展示如何唱咏

translation.en: ♪ Get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.zh: 所以站起身 走出门 重新燃起热情

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.zh: 醒来吧 你只需睁开双眼

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.zh: 看到自己所得 在雨中嘹亮高歌

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.zh: 唤醒你的梦想 让它照进现实

translation.en: [Julie continues singing] ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.en: ♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.zh: 重新燃起热情 走出黑暗迎接光明

translation.en: ♪ I wanna hear it, hear it ♪
♪ No need to fear it You're not alone ♪
translation.zh: 无需畏惧 我们一起同行
你总会找到属于自己的路径

translation.en: ♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.zh: 醒来吧 你只需睁开双眼

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.zh: 看到自己所得 在雨中嘹亮高歌

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream And make it true ♪
translation.zh: 唤醒你的梦想 让它照进现实

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.zh: 瞭望窗外 审视内心的世界

translation.zh: 重新燃起热情 走出黑暗迎接光明
